review: Great device and easy to install
author: Dr. Greta Steinbach

review: Tried it on 3 different TV's, only worked on one, and the oldest one in the house. Kept blacking out and pausing videos.
author: J. Fiorello

review: The volume on the apps leaves something to be desired - I have to turn up the TV 3x as high for the apps on FireTV stick, :(
author: Joanne Romer

review: Just what i wanted plus even more
author: Amazon Customer

review: no it's not worth the money you have to pay for every app you want to get into

review: All in all very cool device. A little disappointing that the xfinity app is not available when I specifically checked and it was. Hopefully it will come back. Had some initial issues with apps loading customer service was amazing and so very helpful.
author: Momo of 4

review: It works well for Netflix but becomes glitchy after awhile. Sometimes freezes up. It's nice to have but not sure if I would recommend to friends.
author: Mary Mills
